Can I import my Strava runs to Terra?: Strava don't allow runs to be sent from their platform to other platforms like INTVL. The Strava integration we have only allows us to send INTVL runs to Strava.
can i import my strava runs to terra: Strava don't allow runs to be sent from their platform to other platforms like INTVL. The Strava integration we have only allows us to send INTVL runs to Strava.
what's geofence?: The Geofence removes the start and end points if they fall within the geofenced area for when someone else is viewing the run in the community feed. However for the territory game, we don’t remove the geofence as think of the example where you do multiple runs that start at that geofenced area, if you look at the map then there will be an empty circle of space where the geofence is compared to it just showing a larger area of captured territories and therefore revealing where the user has put a geofence.
I can't add my run from garmin to strava: If you complete a run with your Garmin device and it has been synced to INTVL, however you can't add it to Strava, you need to set that up through Strava and integrate directly with Garmin Connect.

Can I import runs from Strava?: Strava don’t allow runs to be exported from their platform they only allow runs to be sent to their platform. So you’ll have to record your runs with the INTVL app, a Garmin watch, Apple Watch or Coros watch.
How to add runs from Strava?: If you complete a run with your Garmin device and it has been synced to INTVL, however you can't add it to Strava, you need to set that up through Strava and integrate directly with Garmin Connect.
Why is my run in manual review?: If a run is in manual review it means it has been flagged by our anti-cheat system. It doesn’t mean you cheated it just requires a manual review from us. If it gets approved it will be added to the map. We try to process the reviews as frequently as possible but sometimes it can take 24+ hours.
What privacy features does INTVL have?: INTVL offers geofencing to create privacy zones around addresses, anonymous profile options, start/end point privacy in Terra mode, and community feed privacy where geofenced areas are removed from public viewing.
How often are competitions held?: INTVL holds regular competitions with prizes, but specific frequency details would need to be confirmed through the app or support team.
